description: Verify that the Feedwater Low Flow Annunciator is illuminated
Verify that the Feedwater Flow is less than 1000 L/sec
Turn the Feedwater Control Valve (FWCV) into Manual mode
Turn the Feedwater Control Valve (FWCV) to 100%

Check if the Feedwater Flow has been restored
If the Feedwater Flow has been restored, End procedure
If the Feedwater Flow had not been restored, Go to step 3.1

Check if the Feedwater Pump is OFF
If the Feedwater Pump Switch is OFF, Turn the Feedwater Pump Switch to ON

Check if the Feedwater Flow has been restored
If the Feedwater Flow has been restored, End procedure
If the Feedwater Flow had not been restored, Go to step 4.1
Adjust the Turbine Bypass Control Valve to 10%
Verify the Reactor Core Temperature is decreasing
Press the Trip Turbine Button
Verify that the Turbine Speed Control Valve is CLOSED (0.0%)
Verify that the Turbine Load Control Valve is CLOSED (0.0%)
Press the Trip Reactor Button
Verify that the All Rods Down Annunciator is illuminated
Verify that the Reactor Reactivity is 0.0%
Press the Activate Safety Injection (SI) Button
Verify that the Safety Injection Engaged Annunciator is illuminated
Verify that the Reactor Core Temperature is decreasing

Check if the Reactor Core Temperature is below 392 DEG F
If the Reactor Core Temperature is below 392 DEG F, Go to step 9.1
If the Reactor Core Temperature is over 392 DEG F, Go to step 9.2
Turn the Power Operated Relief Valve Isolation Valve (PORV IV) to CLOSED
Turn the Recirculation Coolant Pump Switch to OFF

Check if the Reactor Core Temperature is over 250 DEG F
If the Reactor Core Temperature is over 250 DEG F, Slowly adjust the Turbine Bypass Control Valve up to 100%
Verify that the Reactor Core Temperature is maintained below 250 DEG F
Return the Turbine Bypass Control Valve to 0%
